1.Text:
One day, at the Shadow Garden hideout, the Seven
Shadows were called together.

Umm...so why are we here today? Did I do something
wrong?!

Then only a certain dumb dog would be here,
wouldn't she?
You're probably right...

...Huh?! Hey pussy cat! Are you calling me a
dumb dog?!
I thought you could figure that out, but maybe not?

Could you guys knock it off, please? I'm sure
Lady Alpha will know the reason why we were
called here.

It's pretty rare...that most of us are here
on time...
...And this is coming from you?

More importantly, where's Gamma? Even Eta is on time.
It's not like her to be late.
I was ready...five minutes ago...heheh.
You seem quite full of yourself today...

I wonder if something happened to Gamma. Maybe she
got seriously injured...
I doubt it...but I can't say that with confidence...

Aroo! Does that mean we're here to find out that
Gamma's been kicked out?! It's finally my time to
step up to third rank!
Then...good luck running Mitsugoshi...

Eep?! That's way too hard! Beta, I'll let you be
third place if you let me be second!
That's not a fair deal at all...
Everyone is energetic as usual I see.
The five members face Alpha, who has shown up late.

I only picked up part of your conversation,
but surely Gamma is fine as I haven't heard
word about her being injured.
Y-You were listening?! Not that I said anything bad!
Anyways, enough fooling around...

So why are we here today, Lady Alpha? It's not the
time for our regular meetings...
I have no idea myself, actually.
Huh?

Gamma is the one who requested this meeting, so it
would be better to ask her.
Speaking of Gamma, here she comes.
*splat!*
Yep, that sounds like Gamma!

The door opens slowly, and a disheveled Gamma
staggers in.
Th-Thank you for coming...everyone...
Your nose is bleeding...

Gamma wipes away the blood and begins talking as if
nothing had happened.
Ahem... I'll get right to the point then.

Exactly one month from today I would like to hold
an anniversary party to express our gratitude to
our lord, for all he has done for us!
Anniversary...
Party?!
Will there be loads of yummy food to eat?!

A party! What a lovely idea! It'd be a fantastic
chance to show our appreciation!
He might enjoy the change of pace.

But a party is quite unusual. Aren't there usually
other reasons to hold one?

You're quite right. If I hadn't learned about the idea
from him, I wouldn't have thought of it myself.
Previously, he taught me several business tricks.

To "create business opportunities instead of waiting
for them," and that "everyone's looking for reasons
to buy what they want, but those who create reasons
are the winners."

Everyone's reaction earlier after hearing the words
"party" and "anniversary" is the proof. We can
create whatever reasons we want to celebrate!
I see...
However, it does need to be convincing...

Take Mitsugoshi, for example, and our "First
Anniversary Celebration."

However, such a specific occasion isn't always
necessary. We can turn events such as a "Customer
Appreciation Festival" or a "Bargain Sale" into
business chances.

Importantly, our feelings are the theme. We can
have a party simply by being united in our desire
to express gratitude to our lord!
So then...every day is an anniversary! Right?!
Were you even listening, Delta?

Well...I suppose that's one way of looking at it...
I only meant to explain the concept of anniversaries.

There is the wonderful idea that any time is a
good time to celebrate, which means this party
is not unusual at all.
Everyone understands, right?

Yes, of course. If Master Shadow taught you that,
Gamma, then he might be expecting something big!

In any case, it's the thought that counts. We can
celebrate the fact that we haven't lost anyone in
all this fighting, and thank him properly—
Let's keep that in mind as we prepare.

And since you're in charge, Gamma, I trust you will
do your best.

Absolutely. I'll do everything possible to make it
a success!

All right, everyone, let's give our lord the best
party ever!
Yes!

2.Text:
As Gamma suggested, the Seven Shadows decide to hold
an anniversary party. The girls start to prepare, but...
I'll give a basic and brief description of my plan.
Brief?
Some people can't remember unless it's simplified.
Huh?
Okay, you two, that's enough. Let me explain.

First, I'll build a party venue and invite our lord
to see it.
A new party venue? Built from scratch?

Yes, it's a surprise party, so we'll build it in an
obscure place in the Garden's territory.

You'll then execute the roles that I assign you, such
as food preparation, hospitality, and so on.
Food and hospitality... Our skills are being tested.

When we're done...let's enjoy ourselves! If everyone
does their job, then we can relax and have fun!
Awooo!

Let's split up the workload into three main tasks:
setting up, cooking, and serving.
I can think of someone suitable for those jobs.
Right. I've made a few choices already.

Zeta and Eta, you two are in charge of setting up
the party venue.

Since Zeta has traveled all over the world, she can
make a design that suits the party's theme—

Eta built Mitsugoshi from the ground up, so she is
unrivaled when it comes to architecture.

No problem. I'll design a venue suited to our lord's
preferences.
I could get it done in a day...if you want me to.

No need to hold yourself back. Unlike with Mitsugoshi,
there is no public eye to worry about here.

Next, for cooking, I'll let Beta and Epsilon handle
that task.
Heheh...you picked the right person.

What if my lord goes head over heels for my cooking?
And what if I do something else for him afterwards?
Hehehe.
You can keep that to yourself...you know...?

...I hope you haven't forgotten about me, Epsilon.
We're going to cook as a team, right?

And Delta... I'd like you to check in on the progress
of the setup and cooking.
Check-in? What do you mean? Like at a hotel?

If they run out of supplies or need anything, please
get it for them. You're a helper, essentially.
A helper?! I've done that before, so it'll be easy!

...Didn't you forget to buy something when you were
a "helper" in the past?
Graah?! I-I'm grown up now, so don't worry!
We're counting on you, okay Delta?
Y-Yes, leave it to me!
So does that leave me in charge of serving?

Yes, you'll support Master Shadow. There's no
set task, just be by his side at all times and do
whatever is requested—
...Be by his side at all times?
A-And do whatever is requested?!
I-I want to do the serving role!
I should be attending him! I want to do it!
Wh-Why does everyone want to be a server?!

Because the server gets to stay next to Master Shadow.
They do whatever he wants, like bring him tasty food,
and get compliments from him—
Th-That's not fair! I want to do that too! Awooo!
I can do both set up and serving.
It'd be a lot of work...but also rewarding...

I-I had a feeling this would happen... But it's okay,
because the positions are just a suggestion.
Let's make a decision that everyone can agree on.

I wish we all could do it, but I think two is the
maximum because we won't have enough people
for the other jobs.

*sigh* We won't reach an agreement no matter how
much we talk. Let's do that game to decide...
Do you mean...
Seven Shadows Rock-Paper-Scissors...?!
Rock!
Huh?! We're starting already?!
Rock, paper, scissors...
Shoot!

The Seven Shadows suddenly begin playing Rock Paper
Scissors. It only lasts one round.
...How fitting. Heheh.
Yay! I won!
Awoo, I lost...
I'm glad I lost...that job needs stamina...
Why did you join then...?

Congratulations to both of you. Now we need to think
about reorganizing our cooking staff.
Come to think of it, what are you going to do, Gamma?
I'll do behind-the-scenes work.

We only get one chance, and I don't want to make
a mistake and ruin our precious anniversary party.
Gamma...

Actually...I don't want to serve anymore. I'll let
you take care of it, Gamma.

Finding the right people for cooking is hard, right?
Is there anyone else better at cooking than me?

And besides...you thought of everything, right Gamma?
What's the point of doing all this hard work if you
can't enjoy it?
So that's why you should be serving!

I-I appreciate your kindness, but... I might fall on
my face and create an awkward situation, so...

Enough! You said you were going to pull out all the
stops for Master Shadow, right?! So do it!

You should accept her request, Gamma. I'm also here
for you, and you have my full support.

We'll support you...with slime...if you're about
to fall.
Lady Alpha...Eta...
Thank you...everyone! I'll...give it my best shot—
Gyaaah!
Can she really handle this...?

Gamma falls spectacularly as she makes a triumphant
pose. Smiling, she raises her bruised face.

3.Text: A few days after the party preparations began—
Is this...is this the dress for servers?
Yes! You look lovely.
It suits you too, Gamma.

But it's an unusual design, right? I can tell it's
quite uncommon.

It comes from our lord's Shadow Wisdom. Previously,
when I inquired about a dress that is easy to move
in, our lord told me about it.

It was designed with women in mind. It has a nice
design and supreme functionality.

Yes, it feels easier to move around in than other
dresses. You could even battle in it without any
issues, right?

I-I don't think there will be any fighting... So, you
don't mind if I go ahead with this design?

Not at all. As long as it can be visualized, all we
have to do is recreate it with our slime bodysuits.

Thanks to the slime bodysuits, our outfits don't cost
anything.

As for setting up, cooking, and other preparations,
so far we're within the budget.

What about the time frame? You were planning a new
venue, weren't you?
According to Eta, it seems to be almost finished.
Already?! It hasn't even been two weeks...

Unlike with Mitsugoshi, there's no time to spare,
so Eta's taking it seriously. Do you want to check
her progress later?

As Gamma and Alpha make their way to the party venue,
they spot Zeta and Eta.
Just as I...imagined...

It looks great. We finished it faster than I
thought possible.
A-Amazing...
It looks like it's nearly finished.

Huh? Lady Alpha and Gamma? What are you two
doing here?

I finished up today's mission quickly and was just
meeting with Gamma to discuss our outfits. I didn't
expect you two to make this much progress.
Well...you didn't say go slow...piece of cake...
Outstanding. Did you come up with the design, Zeta?

Yeah. When I was on my missions, I remembered a few
places I thought were nice. I made some tweaks,
but it's not bad, right?
By the way, your dresses sure have a rare design.
It's definitely a fresh take... *gulp*

It seems easy to move around in, practical and
functional... I want one too...

No comment on the design, huh... Despite the praise,
I don't feel overjoyed...

Is it just the two of you? I thought Delta was also
working with you...
Oh yeah...Delta is—
Did I keep you...waiting?

Delta bursts in, carrying a mountain of tables and
other furniture.
Lady Alpha? Gamma? What are you doing here?
We're here to see your progress.
That's a lot to carry at once...
Nah! This is nothing!

It's furniture for Master Shadow, so treat it
carefully.
I-I know that! I'll put them down here.
Thanks... Let's place them evenly apart.

Eta skillfully uses slime to lift and position the
furniture effortlessly.
I guess this is how you worked so quickly.

It seems so. No problems whatsoever with the progress.
If anything, the venue will be completed ahead of
schedule.

Finishing early is good, but I'd rather avoid doing
more work with the dumb dog. Just as I've sent her
miles away to carry stuff...

Can you give her more work, Gamma? Like making her go
on a long journey—
Fish-brain! I heard that! Graaawooooh!
Can you both refrain from fighting?
I'm done... Good night...
At least go to your own room to sleep, Eta...
Hmm, I guess everything is turning out well...
...Yes. I'm glad we could check in on things.
Do you want to see how the cooking is going?

Hmm, yes, I'd like to check on things. Since it's
those two, though, they should be fine...

Gamma and Alpha decide to head to the kitchen to
check on Beta and Epsilon—

4.Text: We're almost at the kitchen.
Right. I hope things are going smoothly—
Huh? I can hear their voices even from here.

Beta... Are you seriously planning on serving food that
crazy at the party?
I-Is there something wrong with it?

Judging by their voices, it seems they are
getting along.
...Let's hurry and find out.

In the Garden's kitchen, their voices echo along with
the sound of clanging knives and sizzling frying pans.
The presentation is just as important as the taste!

Right? This dish is based on the scenery that
Master Shadow said was breathtaking!

Black omelet rice, like Master Shadow's gallant
profile, in black soup as dark as the night sky—

Huh?! The presentation is important?! It looks awful!
How did you make it pitch-black like that?!

Th-That's a bit harsh, isn't it? I think it would be
a shame for a cook to not show a bit of originality.

Do you plan on serving that plain old dish, Epsilon?
Are you just going for taste?

What?! All of us are going to eat it, so I think it's
important to keep the recipe simple!

Being able to recreate it the day of the event is key!
This is why I can't stand amateur cooks like you!
What did you say?!

They argue and bicker, but samples of their dishes
are placed on the table one after another.

Despite how much they argue, that doesn't slow them
down from cooking up a storm...
Yes, they sure get along well, huh? Heheh...
Y-Yes, probably... Let's see how they're doing.
After you, then.
Whew... Let's calm down a little and talk.

Just listen, will you? We're cooking for the party,
so the presentation has to be gorgeous, right?

Don't you think the food we serve to Master Shadow
should be at this level?
Y-Yeah, I get that...

I don't want to cut corners when it comes to our
lord's food, but when I think of everyone else...
How are you two doing?
Huh?! Lady Alpha?! Gamma?
Wh-When did you get here?

We've been watching you since your spirited
discussion. Things are going well I presume?
Y-Yes, of course! Right, Beta?
Y-Yes! Totally smooth! Haha...ha...

Lady Alpha's just being straight forward,
but she comes off as a bit scary...

We were just sharing our opinions, not fighting!
Nope! Not fighting at all!

Want to try some? I'm confident in the taste, but
getting an objective opinion would be great...!

Oh, I'm not worried about the taste, but I'll try
some since we're here.
I'll try some too.
Alpha and Gamma begin tasting the food.

It's delicious...I'd expect nothing less. Especially the
sauce. Shadow would love this type of sandwich.

This...artistic...cuisine is also somehow fascinating.
I think it has the same mysteriousness as our lord.

If you can make food of this quality, there's no need
to intervene. Please continue.

I agree. If you keep this up, I'm sure the food will
be spectacular.
But...can I just say one thing?
What is it?

It might be hard, but I'm hoping for something fresh
and new for the anniversary party.

Something expensive would be too boring. If we could
get creative or source some rare ingredients...
Get creative...
Rare ingredients...

Beta, you were talking about the importance of
presentation, right? I think that's good. And you
had a good point too, Epsilon.

But, failure is not an option on the day of the party.
When you have a responsibility, sometimes you need
to know when to give up on something.

So I think it's important to overcome adversity
with ideas.

I'm not saying that you have no choice, of course,
but I'd be happy if you could give it your all.

You're right...I got a little worked up. Your advice
was very helpful, thank you.

It's a party, so I'll do everything possible to
ensure everyone enjoys themselves!

Understood, Gamma. Creativity is our strong point.
Leave it to us!

We're counting on you both! If you need anything,
you can ask Delta for help too.

D-Delta... Maybe I'll get her to look for some rare
ingredients... Hahaha...
I agree, that sounds like a good idea.

There are only a few days left until the party...
but let's all pull together to make it a success!
Yeah!

5.Text:
A few days later, Gamma invites Cid to meet her near
the Abyss Woods.
It's pretty rare for me to be summoned by Gamma.

But why the middle of the woods, of all places?
We always meet at Mitsugoshi.

But I dig mysterious gestures like this. I'm kind
of excited.

In her letter, it said, "I have an important thing to
tell you." I wonder what she meant by that. Maybe—

My lord, the time has come to implement the
Super Strategy.
So, the moment has finally come.

The organization has grown beyond expectations, so we
are moving to the next phase of the plan.
...Very well. But let us tread carefully.
(...A secret strategy? Or—)
We have a list of potential new members.

The Seven Shadows will be expanded to 12 members
next month. Please help us select the five new members,
my lord.
Hmm...fascinating. Gotta catch 'em all, huh.

(...Or something like that. I'm open to anyone who
wants to tag along with a shadowbroker.)

But being called the 12 Shadows sounds pretty lame.
Maybe the Squad of 12 or the 12 Swordswomen... Nah.
We could call the new five "Pentagram" or something...

It's got the right flavor, but I'm starting to sound
a bit delusional.
Ah...but I guess it's not always good news—
This is the place...but there's no one here.
Huh? There's a letter here.

"Instead of being the president of Mitsugoshi, I've
always wanted to be an author."

"So I will close Mitsugoshi. I wish you all the best,
my lord. From Gamma."

Hmmm, I dislike that kind of dreary turn of events...
It brings back old, traumatic memories...

But it's also true that I've been relying on Gamma
for money lately. I need to depend on myself. I don't
want to be a selfish princess's slave again.
Cid's joyful expression dims as he lets out a sigh.
Well. I guess I won't know until I get there.

Letting his imagination run wild with various
scenarios, Cid reaches his destination.
A marvelous building stands alone in the forest.
Was this even here before? ...Ah, whatever.

Without giving it much thought, Cid goes inside.
And then—

He opens the door and sees something he never has
before... A spectacular and dazzling party hall.
Where am I...?
The Seven Shadows stand in front of him.
(No way... I got a bad feeling about this—)
My lord...
I-I'm not mentally ready for this yet—
Thank you for everything!

After Gamma, the other Seven Shadows take turns
thanking him.
...Huh? What's going on?

Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule
to come here today, my lord.

We organized a surprise anniversary party to show
our thanks to you!

...Right. But I'm the one who should be saying thanks.
You really didn't have to go out of your way to do all
of this.
Is this place new? I don't remember seeing it.
Yes. Zeta, Eta, and Delta built and set it up.
I-Is that right? You guys did a fantastic job.

(Right...these kind of things are always more fun
when you can help prepare. Just like with school
festivals, setting things up is actually the best
part, right?)

(Damn, If I had known, I would've helped out!
Don't leave me out, everyone!)
Hmm? Speaking of Delta, where is she?

I asked her to get some ingredients, but it seems
to be taking her longer than expected...
She said she'd be back before the party started...
I hope she comes back soon.

(Is Delta's plan like an "I got invited to a friend-I-
don't-like-much's birthday, but I don't want to look
bad so I'll arrive when it's about to end" bare
minimum kind of thing?)

(No, that's not it. I'm sure she doesn't hate me
like that. I'm just being negative.)

I am deeply sorry for this... But the rest of us will
continue the party, so don't worry.

Th-Thanks... Still, it's amazing you prepared such
a fantastic party from scratch.

Eta and I were in charge of building and decorating.
We went for a relaxed vibe focusing on aspects from
each country I've been to. Do you like it?
Yeah, I love it. Great atmosphere.
Mission accomplished!
Heheh.
Here's some food and drink for you, Shadow.
Huh? Oh, thanks.

Gamma and I will be at your service today, so don't
be afraid to let us know if you need anything.

We also have other types of dishes, so please let us
know if you would like to try them!

At my service... Got it. I see you two are wearing
different outfits than usual.

(I've seen this design somewhere before... Is this
what happens when you try to highlight a woman's
beauty? Did I teach them this?)
It's perfect for you two, very mature.
I'm very flattered...by your kind words...!

Gamma, calm down. If you get too excited,
you'll trip.
...I-I've always thought of myself as mature anyway.

A-Anyways, say something about the food too. It was
made specially for you.

Oh yeah, I am pretty hungry. What is there to eat?
I'll try some right now.

Huh? Are these...the names of the dishes or
something? Hmm...
"Baby Shrimp and Fan Mussel Duet: Starry Night".

And over here is... "Beef and Pasta: A Perfect
Harmony of Flavors".

What do you think, my lord? I-I named them. I thought
it would make the food look more appetizing...
Beta...you came up with this?!
Y-Yes! D-Do you not like it or something?!

(I can't believe it. The Beta that has been making
a living with stolen ideas has made something
original...!)

(The food and the titles don't quite match, but she's
showing progress. I...I...!)
I'm extremely impressed!
R-Really?!

I-I'm thrilled you like it that much! Lucky me!
Heehee...!
What's with that creepy laugh of yours?
Hee hee hee! Hah hah hah!
You're a lost cause... I have to act quickly...
Ah, Epsilon. You made most of this food, right?
Y-Yes! That's exactly right!
...Did I mention that before or something?

The food tastes just the way I like it, exactly like
how you prepare my favorite tea. *munch*
I-I had no idea your taste buds were so precise...!

On top of that, you're the best cook here, Epsilon.
Everything tastes amazing. *munch*...

You remember the taste of my cooking...?! I'm beyond
words! Oh...!

(Well, the way the volume is "enhanced" was truly
the deciding factor...)
You two must be happy that he is enjoying your food.
Hee hee hee! Hah hah hah!
I wonder if those two will snap out of it later...?
I highly doubt it...
Y-You won't believe this!
Delta?! Where have you been?!
L-Lecture me later! Listen—!
The reason Delta came charging in so quickly is—

6.Text: Y-You won't believe this! In the forest—
Ah, Boss man is here!

Delta seems flustered, but when she notices Cid,
she changes direction and bounds toward him.
Wh-Whoa!
Thank you for everything, Boss!
Yeah, don't mention it. Ah, there, there.
Heheh!
So what happened to you?
Right! Let me explain.

I was looking for some rare stuff for Boss. I went to
the Abyss Woods, 'cause rare stuff is in dangerous
places, right?
The Abyss Woods... I'm shocked you didn't get lost.
I thought I could find something rare there...

Ah, but I did get lost, so I had to go into survival
mode for a couple of days... *sniff*

So I was going here and there looking for a way out,
and I found a huge, freaky boar!
A huge, freaky boar?
I see. But you could handle it, right Delta?
Absolutely! I'm the strongest there is!

But I thought, if the boar went on a rampage, then the
trees might fall over and make a huge mess, so I came
back. I'm so thoughtful!

I'm surprised, but good job. I wonder if regular
discipline has finally paid off.

I knew Boss would be here today, so I made sure to
not cause any trouble. Heheh!
So you mean you don't have to be careful around me?
Eek! It was just a speech figure!
I remember its smell, so I can probably track it!

Can you track it, or not...? Anyways, we need to act
quickly, before something happens. Let's follow Delta.

But the boar could be luring us into a trap. We don't
know its aim, so let's split up.

Epsilon, Gamma. Can you tell Zeta and Eta to stay
here with you?
Understood.
We will join you immediately if needed.
All right. I'll go with Beta and Delta. And...

Alpha turns to Cid, struggling to say something.
Cid notices this.
(Riiiight.)
Mind if I tag along? I won't get in the way.

(This might be part of their act. It could lead to
a surprise or something.)

(It feels like they're forcing this a bit, but it's my job
to go along with whatever they have set up for me.)
O-Of course! Thank you!
Great. Okay, let's go.
We're pretty deep into the forest.
Yes, the fog is thick, too. How much further, Delta?
*sniff, sniff*... We're close! Oh! Over there!
Hmm, is this place...

It's definetly a "huge, freaky boar"... It has white
fur and massive horns. What strange features.
I can take it! Can I give it a go?
Delta, stay.

Don't forget, we have Cid with us, and that boar is
certainly more powerful than it looks.

That's why we need more information before we
engage it. There could be more enemies here
than just the boar.

R-Right! I'll let Beta take care of the
difficult stuff!
Yeah, yeah... I'm already aware of that.

From this distance, I can't tell if it's a monster or
an animal. It's the largest creature I've seen since
the Mist Dragon.

When we entered the Abyss Woods for the first time,
my speculation was—

Thought they'd have more backbone living in such a
dangerous forest.

True, the monsters are displaying fewer signs of
mutation than I anticipated.
Mutation...?
...Um, explain it a little simpler!

Let's see... The Abyss Woods is overflowing with
poisonous fog.

We've been trying to avoid it as we make our way
through the woods.

But the monsters we've encountered haven't adapted
to the fog and live their lives avoiding its poison.

In other words, the fog hasn't been around for long
since the monsters haven't had enough time to
adapt to it.

If the monsters haven't adapted...does that mean the
fog isn't natural?!
I don't remember that.
...I figured.
Hmph. That felt like a snappy remark.

Back then, I hypothesized that not enough time had
passed for any adaptations to occur.

But time has passed, and monsters have now mutated
and adapted to the toxic fog. What do you think of my
theory, Lady Alpha?

I think you're right, Beta. That's definitely one
possibility.
I dunno what you mean, but I think you're right!

There are no strong magical traces, and there's not
much of a chance it's anyone's pet. Lady Alpha, on
your signal—
I've got another theory.
Hmm? Master Shadow?

If your hypothesis is correct, there could be several
of these monsters.
Ah...

But Delta saw only one. It'd be normal to see others
after being here for two days.
Right, I only saw this one!
I see...

So it's possible that the boar is a monster that
someone created on purpose, right?
Ugh... I still have much to learn about theorizing...

Amazing, Master Shadow! I can't believe you came up
with another possibility so quickly!
Shadow...you already have it figured out, don't you?
I'm not so sure...

(Honestly, I'm impressed with their performances.
This surprise hunting event has been entertaining.)

(It's too bad, I really want to be on board with the
whole surprise thing, but I also want to let them
know I saw through their charade.)

(If I do that, their performances and ability to
surprise will get better. It's harsh, but that's
tough love.)

(There's something fishy about that boar. They must
have caught it somewhere and transported here, or
maybe it's one of Eta's experiments...)

(I'm sure the others members are watching me, waiting
to see my reaction. Sorry, girls.)
Right...?

Cid looks at the sky and mumbles to himself.
And then—
Whoa!

The Abyss Woods rustles loudly. It is as if the forest
is speaking.
Could this be...?!
(Okay, it's time to get to the bottom of things—)
The Mist Dragon...?

I can only guess, but other than us, he's the only
one who can do whatever he wants in this forest.
Does this mean that the boar is the Mist Dragon?
No, but that's not a bad guess.
Maybe he created...a special entity.

Then it's time for a revenge match! No excuses,
no matter what monster it is! Graah!

We're stronger than before, so make sure to watch
closely, Master Shadow!
Okay... Go for it.

7.Text: Time for the finish!
Graarrrr...!
...Hmph. It wasn't even that strong.

But it had tough skin and sometimes spat poison.
It was hard to fight...

A couple years ago, I think we would've had a more
difficult time.

Analysis, diversion, coordination. We used to fight
by instinct, but now we're more disciplined.
Did you see how much we've improved, Master Shadow?!
Huh? O-Oh, absolutely! Bravo!

(Wow, I didn't expect the Mist Dragon in this
situation... I definitely lost a point there.)

(It's not just the members here, but all of them have
really leveled up... Their surprise was no joke.)

I'm hungry... Haven't eaten real food for two days...
I'm all out of energy...

Oh yeah! We just defeated that boar, so let's chow
down on it!
Delta takes a bite of the boar without any hesitation.

Wait, Delta! It's been exposed to the toxic fog!
It could be poisonous!
*munch, munch, munch*...
Are you all right...?
Agh... Mmmm...!

D-Delta?! This is bad! It must be poisonous...!
Let's take her to Gamma and the others—
...Mmmy! Yummy! It's delicious!
Huh?

It's so crunchy! It's high in protein, but more of the
juicy flavor comes out the more you chew! Yummmm!
I feel a lot better now! Maximum Delta Power!

Well, I'm just glad that you're all right. Everyone's
waiting for us, so let's head back to the party.
I'll carry the boar! Here we go... Hup!

Cid and the others return to the party and explain
the situation.
I see. So that's what happened...

It's ripped to shreds...it has colorless meat...
Interesting...
It looks gross, but the meat's quality is top-notch.

But how are we able to eat it? Without a doubt
it's poisonous...

Creatures adapted to poison...do not necessarily have
toxins...throughout their body...

As long as you avoid...the organ that contains
poison...it should be edible...
(Hmmm, kind of like a pufferfish.)
But how did it come to be, exactly...?
This is a wildly optimistic guess, but...
Go ahead. We'll hear you out.
...It's a gift from the Mist Dragon, my lord.
...It's quite romantic, right? Ahaha...

That's what I thought you'd say, Beta. I think it's
the most believable scenario.
Would you mind cooking this, Epsilon?

Sure, leave it to me, Lady Alpha. You seem to know
a lot about this stuff, Eta, so can you help me?
Is it okay...to take the poisonous bits?
Y-Yeah...
Epsilon and Eta take the white boar to the kitchen.
Hmm...

(I see. So that's the punchline. Well, whatever the
truth is, I lost fair and square.)

(Blessing of the Mist Dragon... Sounds like something
from a video game.)

A few minutes later, Epsilon and Eta bring the cooked
boar meat.

Thanks for waiting! We checked it for poison, and it
should be safe to eat. Dig in!
Meat! I wanna eat it all!
Don't actually eat it all, dumb dog.
What did you say? I'm not giving you any, pussy cat!
...Be quiet.

That's enough, you two. Not in front of Shadow.
It looks like everyone is here.
All right... Let's dig in.
My lord?! When did you...?!

I thought I should honor everyone's hard work and
the Mist Dragon's blessing.

Let's make a toast. Gamma, since you're the party
organizer, you can do the honors.
S-Sure. If you insist—

To Master Shadow, and to celebrate six months
since reuniting...
Cheers!
Cheers!
Cheers.

Amid the light clinking of glasses and the splendid
dishes set before them, and with the Mist Dragon's
blessing, the Garden held a joyous party.
